title: Efficient electrochemical water oxidation catalyzed by N4-coordinated nickel complexes under neutral conditions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00303A, Paper
Zhijun Ruan, Jinfeng Dong, Jieying Wang, Zhichao Qi, Xiaoli Chen, Xiangming Liang, Junqi Lin
Two novel nickel complexes are reported for the first time. Both complexes can catalyze water oxidation under neutral conditions with low onset overpotential. Combined experiments confirm that they are genuine molecular water oxidation catalysts.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
